rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0001
rows.name:
So yeah, BLADE Tower.
When we come here, it's usually to stop by BLADE HQ.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0002
rows.name:
The higher-ups like Secretary Nagi and Commander Vandham
will spend most of their day here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0003
rows.name: The government leaders, too—they're based in the tower.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Guys like our new "Director General"
Maurice Chausson, for example.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0005
rows.name:
BLADEs sometimes report to the leadership here after
we finish key assignments. You'll want to remember this place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0006
rows.name: Aaand that about does it for our tour.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0006_3
rows.name: Whattaya think? Pretty amazing setup, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0006_4
rows.name: You can't WAIT to join BLADE, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0008
rows.name: We're not here to make a sales pitch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0009
rows.name:
We just want you to have all the facts so you
can make an informed decision to join us—or not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0010
rows.name: Now that you've seen where and how we work...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Hopefully it made a good impression,
but your decision will be just that—your decision.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0012
rows.name:
In any case, let's head back to the barracks.
Secretary Nagi will be waiting.[ST:wait ]
